price: Fãce a kan mãtan aurensu, kõ kuwa abin da hannayen dãmansu suka mallaka to lalle sũ bã waɗanda ake zargi, ba, ne.
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
